item.title: 6.4.1 Points
item.description: ‚ùó Only authorized accounts can access this section ! Points # Points is the unit used for the activities of providing and maintaining software services on the platform GPS GoTrack. Each account is given a wallet containing the number of Points that the account owns. To see the points in the child accounts, do the following: Click on Manage > Balance > Points.

item.title: 6.4.2 Transaction History
item.description: Transaction History # To view point transaction history do the following: Click on Manage > Balance > Transaction history. 1. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Date: Select the start and end time you want to see the transaction history. Ref: Fill in Ref code correctly or leave it blank to find all. Type: Select the type of transaction to view history.
